bibl.bibl: Saporta, Louis Charles Joseph Gaston de. 1866b. La flore des tufs quaternaires en Provence. Comptes rendus du Congrès Scientifique de France 33: 267–96. [Offprint, Aix, 1867.]
bibl.idno: DAR Pam G431; title taken from Nick’s list so check. SE: Not found as UL Journal. RSCP has this as 1866, Sessions des Congrès Scientifique de France, so I changed date (from 1867). Copy located in Bibliotheque nationale catalogue by Emma: date 1866 for the 33d session at Aix-en-Provence and Nice confirmed from catalogue entry. Journals also in Oxford and BL but don’t know what dates.
